i.name: Fury of the North
i.description: <mainText>After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.</mainText>

q.name: Arctic Assault
q.description: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.

w.name: Winter's Wrath
w.description: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.

e.name: Permafrost
e.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.

r.name: Glacial Prison
r.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.

riot.name: Fury of the North
riot.description: <mainText>After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.</mainText>

i1.name: Fury of the North
i1.blurb: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage. Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.
i1.description: {{sbc|Frost Armor:}} '''Sejuani''' receives [[File:Sejuani Frost Armor.png|18px|link=]] ''Frost Armor'' if she hasn't taken damage from large [[monster]]s and enemy [[champion]]s in the last 12 seconds, lingering for 3 seconds after taking damage.
i1.description2: [[File:Sejuani Frost Armor.png|18px|link=]] ''Frost Armor'' engulfs {{ui|Bristle}} in True Ice, becoming [[Slow resist#Slow Immunity|immune]] to {{tip|slow|slows}} and gains {{sti|armor|{{as|20 (+ 25% '''bonus''' armor) '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|20 (+ 25% '''bonus''' magic resistance) '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}.
i1.description3: {{sbc|Icebreaker:}} Enemies {{tip|stun|stunned}} by '''Sejuani''' are ''Frozen''. '''Sejuani's''' basic attacks and abilities against ''Frozen'' enemies consume the effect to deal {{as|{{pp|3|10 to 20|1;7;14|key=%}} of their '''maximum''' health}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}, capped to 300 against epic monsters.

riot.name: Arctic Assault
riot.description: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
riot.tooltip: Sejuani charges, dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage to enemies and knocking them up. The charge ends after hitting an enemy champion.

q1.name: Arctic Assault
q1.blurb: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sejuani''' signals {{ui|Bristle}} to {{tip|dash}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds all enemies he passes through until the charge ends or upon colliding with an enemy [[champion]].
notes: *[[Minion]]s and [[monster]]s are getting slightly {{tip|airborne|knocked towards}} the direction '''Sejuani''' was charging from.

riot.name: Winter's Wrath
riot.description: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
riot.tooltip:
Sejuani swings her flail, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) physical damage and applying Frost to enemies hit and knocking minions and monsters back.

She then lashes out with her flail, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ f4 }}) physical damage, applying Frost and slowing enemies hit briefly.

w1.name: Winter's Wrath
w1.blurb: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.25}}-seconds delay, '''Sejuani''' swings her flail in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all enemies hit and {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} minions and monsters.
w1.description2: She then lashes out with her flail after {{fd|0.75}} seconds in a straight line in the same direction, dealing additional {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies hit by 75% for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
w1.leveling2: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 190}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|4.5}}% '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|20+30 to 40+190}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} {{as|(+ 6% '''maximum''' health)}}}}
w1.description3: '''Sejuani''' can move freely during ''Winter's Wrath''. Both swings will strike in the cast direction, but their hitboxes follow '''Sejuani's''' movement.
notes: * {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage - either the swing or the lash.
* The ability's cooldown starts after both flail attacks are completed.

riot.name: Permafrost
riot.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Nearby melee allied champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy champions, large monsters, medium monsters, and large minions.

Active: Target enemy with 4 stacks of Frost takes {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, is stunned for {{ e1 }} second(s), and is briefly displaced.

Enemy champions stunned by Sejuani cannot gain Frost for {{ f2 }} seconds.

e1.name: Permafrost
e1.blurb: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} {{ai|Winter's Wrath|Sejuani}} and both '''Sejuani's''' and {{tt|nearby|1100 range}} allied {{tip|melee}} champions' basic attacks apply ''Frost'' to enemy champions, epic, large and medium monsters, super minions and siege minions for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.
e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} If the targeted enemy has 4 stacks of ''Frost'', '''Sejuani''' consumes all stacks to deal {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|airborne|knock them back}} and {{tip|stun}} them for 1 second.
e1.description3: Enemy champions {{tip|stun|stunned}} by '''Sejuani''' cannot gain ''Frost'' for {{pp|3|10 to 8|1;7;14}} seconds.

riot.name: Glacial Prison
riot.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
riot.tooltip:
Sejuani throws her True Ice bola that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and stuns them for {{ e2 }} second.

The bola becomes more powerful as it travels, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, stunning for {{ e6 }} seconds and creating a storm that slows other enemies by {{ e8 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slows by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} second.

r1.name: Glacial Prison
r1.blurb: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sejuani''' throws a True Ice bola in the target direction, stopping at the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for 1 second.
r1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 150 3}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Empowered Magic Damage|{{ap|150 to 350 3}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
r1.description2: The bola deals increased damage, {{tip|stun|stuns}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and shatters upon reaching maximum range or upon colliding with a unit beyond {{tt|400 range|estimated}}, creating a storm for 2 seconds that {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies by 30%.
r1.description3: At the end of the duration the storm shatters the ground, dealing the same damage and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies by 80% for 1 second.
r1.description4: The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.
notes: * ''Glacial Prison'' affects minions only if they are within detonation radius.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage.
* The {{tip|stun}} will apply {{tip|single target}} spell effect, while the storm will apply {{tip|area of effect}} spell damage.
* The True Ice bola is always thrown at maximum range.
* The True Ice bola does not collide with terrain.
* The True Ice bola applies the freeze immunity of {{ai|Permafrost|Sejuani}} when {{tip|stun|stunning}} a champion.
